name: Travildorn
description: The streets are covered with darkness, through the flashlight you notice a whole horde of zombies! You have to shoot, run, survive...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
